name: $proposal
desc: The care plan represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act

name: $plan
desc: The care plan represents a request/demand and authorization for action

name: $order
desc:
The care plan represents a component or option for a RequestGroup that establishes timing, conditionality and/or other constraints among a set of requests.

Refer to [[[RequestGroup]]] for additional information on how this status is used
